reviewText: Authentic Self defense science, a must watch for any martial arts expert.
Interesting  differant moves than most martial arts DVD.  Too many young kids in it.

Even though I am a Hapkido practitioner there is in the video too much of exhibitionism. Any way that is what we have to practice, to show a little of Hollywood style. When it comes to reality it turns into a very hard way for the opponent, because we know how to fall or jump, but they don't.

this is a rare look at a martial art that usually does not have competitions the demos were good even the ones done by kids that must be only around 6 or 7 what was really good was a chance to see some sparring which was interesting it was taekwondo with sweeps and takedowns

It has good demo's and ok fighting.  It looked like taekwondo with takedowns.  Olympic taekwondo is more exciting because they throw faster, better kicks without the worry of being  swept or taken down. It was still fun to watch because there are very few hapkido tournaments in the world.
